description: This is a shell script used for Remote Feature Control (RFC) in a set-top box. It manages feature enablement, update times, and location transitions for RFC configurations. It includes functions for logging, transitioning RFC files, and checks regarding configuration timestamps.

methods.name: rfcLogging
methods.description: Logs messages with timestamps to the RFC log file.

methods.name: rfcMoveToNewLoc
methods.description: Handles the transition of RFC files from an old location to a new secure location, including copying files and updating configuration states.
